title: Potential announcement for URF (or maybe "NURF")
body:
Take it or leave it.

> For the past year, you've reminded us over and over (and over) of **something we once released**. You bombarded everything from Twitter to telegraphs and overwhelmed computer repair shops with shattered caps lock keys.
Source: http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/champions-skins/skin-preview/youre-cordially-invited-soiree

replies.body: I like how everyone is bitching like the Nurf buff would be constantly on people, Rito know better then that.
Im sure this will be a dull mode like nemesis.

> [{quoted}](name=Crackdogrock,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=c06mcNlO,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-03-28T00:43:58.485+0000)
>
> well for the NURF.. Rip morgana. Her snares are long enough already

max range ashe ult, gg.
